instructions: Open the Messenger mobile app on your iOS or Android smartphone. If you are not already logged in, log in with your Facebook credentials. Scroll to the individual you want to block and hold your finger on their name until a pop-up dialog appears. Select the More option in the dialog box. Select the option to Block messages and tap Done .

Begin by opening the Messenger app on your iOS or Android smartphone. If you are not already logged in, log in with your Facebook credentials. Tap on your Messenger profile photo in the upper left corner. Scroll down to the People option and tap on it. Tap on the Blocked option that appears. Select the individual you want to unblock. Tap Unblock on the next screen.
